mapper.select: SELECT "orderId", "userId", "orderContent", "orderDate", "requestDate", "orderName", "orderState", "orderAddress", "orderPrice", "rentalPrice", rnum FROM ( SELECT order_id AS "orderId", user_id AS "userId", order_content AS "orderContent", order_date AS "orderDate", request_date AS "requestDate", order_name AS "orderName", order_state AS "orderState", order_address AS "orderAddress", order_price AS "orderPrice", rental_price AS "rentalPrice", rownum AS rnum FROM ( SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_id DESC ) ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
select count(order_id) from orders
select count(order_id) from orders where order_state = 0
select count(order_id) from orders where order_state = 1

SELECT "orderId", "userId", "orderContent", "orderDate", "requestDate", "orderName", "orderState", "orderAddress", "orderPrice", "rentalPrice", rnum FROM ( SELECT order_id AS "orderId", user_id AS "userId", order_content AS "orderContent", order_date AS "orderDate", request_date AS "requestDate", order_name AS "orderName", order_state AS "orderState", order_address AS "orderAddress", order_price AS "orderPrice", rental_price AS "rentalPrice", rownum AS rnum FROM ( SELECT * FROM orders WHERE UPPER(order_name) LIKE UPPER('%' || #{keyword} || '%') AND (#{orderState} IS NULL OR order_state = #{orderState}) AND (#{orderDate} IS NULL OR order_date = TO_DATE(#{orderDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) ORDER BY order_id DESC ) ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT order_id FROM staff WHERE staff_id = #{staffId}
SELECT order_id FROM orders WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
SELECT order_detail_id FROM orders WHERE order_detail_id = #{order_detail_id}

SELECT "orderId", "userId", "orderContent", "orderDate", "requestDate", "orderName", "orderState", "orderAddress", "orderPrice", "rentalPrice", rnum FROM ( SELECT order_id AS "orderId", user_id AS "userId", order_content AS "orderContent", order_date AS "orderDate", request_date AS "requestDate", order_name AS "orderName", order_state AS "orderState", order_address AS "orderAddress", order_price AS "orderPrice", rental_price AS "rentalPrice", rownum AS rnum FROM ( SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_id DESC ) ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT od.order_detail_id as "orderDetailId", od.order_id as "orderId", od.contract_id as "contractId", od.order_count as "orderCount", od.start_date as "startDate", od.end_date as "endDate", od.state_type as "stateType", o.order_name as "orderName", o.order_address as "orderAddress", o.order_content as "orderContent", o.order_price as "orderPrice", o.rental_price as "rentalPrice", o.order_date as "orderDate", o.request_date as "requestDate", p.product_model as "productModel", p.product_name as "productName", c.contract_year as "contractYear", c.contract_price as "contractPrice", u.user_phone as "userPhone" FROM order_detail od INNER JOIN orders o ON o.order_id = od.order_id INNER JOIN product p ON p.product_id = od.product_id INNER JOIN contract c ON c.contract_id = od.contract_id INNER JOIN users u ON u.user_id = o.user_id WHERE o.order_id = #{orderId}

SELECT u.user_email AS "userEmail", u.user_phone AS "userPhone", u.user_id AS "userId", u.user_name AS "userName", u.user_address AS "userAddress", s.staff_id AS "staffId", s.work_place AS "workPlace", s.work_status AS "workStatus", a.authority_name AS "authorityName" FROM users u JOIN staff s ON u.user_id = s.user_id JOIN user_authority a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE a.authority_name IN ('ROLE_CODI') AND s.work_status = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE staff SET work_status = CASE WHEN work_status = 0 THEN 1 WHEN work_status = 1 THEN 0 END WHERE staff_id = #{staffId}
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_email AS "userEmail", u.user_phone AS "userPhone", u.user_id AS "userId", u.user_name AS "userName", u.user_address AS "userAddress", s.staff_id AS "staffId", s.work_place AS "workPlace", s.work_status AS "workStatus", a.authority_name AS "authorityName" FROM users u JOIN staff s ON u.user_id = s.user_id JOIN user_authority a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE a.authority_name IN ('ROLE_DRIVER') AND s.work_status = 0
SELECT COALESCE(max(order_detail_id), 0) + 1 FROM order_detail

SELECT s.schedule_id AS "scheduleId", s.visit_date AS "visitDate", s.visit_cycle AS "visitCycle", s.visit_type AS "visitType", s.visit_state AS "visitState", s.staff_id AS "staffId", s.user_id AS "userId", s.order_id AS "orderId", f.work_place AS "workPlace", f.work_status AS "workStatus", u.user_name AS "userName", ua.authority_name AS "authorityName" FROM schedule s INNER JOIN staff f ON f.staff_id = s.staff_id INNER JOIN users u ON u.user_id = f.user_id LEFT JOIN user_authority ua ON ua.user_id = u.user_id AND (ua.authority_name = 'ROLE_CODI' OR ua.authority_name = 'ROLE_DRIVER') WHERE s.order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.delete: delete from schedule where order_id = #{orderId} and staff_id =#{staffId}
mapper.select: SELECT p.product_id AS productId, p.product_name AS productName, COUNT(od.order_detail_id) AS totalSales, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY p.product_id ORDER BY COUNT(od.order_detail_id) DESC) AS salesRank FROM product p JOIN order_detail od ON p.product_id = od.product_id JOIN orders o ON od.order_id = o.order_id WHERE o.order_state = #{orderState} GROUP BY p.product_id, p.product_name ORDER BY COUNT(od.order_detail_id) DESC

SELECT p.product_id AS productId, p.product_name AS productName, COUNT(od.order_detail_id) AS totalSales, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY p.product_id ORDER BY COUNT(od.order_detail_id) DESC) AS salesRank, pf.uuid_name AS uuidName, pf.file_path AS filePath, pf.file_name AS fileName FROM product p JOIN order_detail od ON p.product_id = od.product_id JOIN orders o ON od.order_id = o.order_id LEFT JOIN product_file pf ON p.product_id = pf.product_id -- 이미지 정보 조인 WHERE o.order_state = #{orderState} GROUP BY p.product_id, p.product_name, pf.uuid_name, pf.file_path, pf.file_name ORDER BY COUNT(od.order_detail_id) DESC

SELECT SUM(pf.file_size) AS totalSalesPrice FROM product p JOIN order_detail od ON p.product_id = od.product_id JOIN orders o ON od.order_id = o.order_id LEFT JOIN product_file pf ON p.product_id = pf.product_id WHERE o.order_state = #{orderState}
SELECT COUNT(od.order_detail_id) AS totalSalesCount FROM product p JOIN order_detail od ON p.product_id = od.product_id JOIN orders o ON od.order_id = o.order_id WHERE o.order_state = #{orderState}

SELECT COUNT(u.user_id) AS totalAllCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN ua.authority_name = 'ROLE_USER' THEN u.user_id END) AS totalUserCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN ua.authority_name = 'ROLE_CODI' THEN u.user_id END) AS totalCodiCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN ua.authority_name = 'ROLE_DRIVER' THEN u.user_id END) AS totalDriverCount FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_authority ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id
SELECT AVG(VISITOR_COUNT) FROM VISITOR
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VISITOR (VISITOR_ID, VISIT_DATE, VISITOR_COUNT) VALUES (#{visitorId}, #{visitDate}, #{visitorCount})
mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(MAX(VISITOR_ID), 0) + 1 AS "visitorId" FROM VISITOR;

SELECT order_id AS orderId, user_id AS userId, order_content AS orderContent, order_date AS orderDate, request_date AS requestDate, order_name AS orderName, order_state AS orderState, order_address AS orderAddress, order_price AS orderPrice, rental_price AS rentalPrice FROM orders WHERE ROWNUM <= 7 ORDER BY order_id DESC
